alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 7:57AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Custer County through 845 AM CDT... At 756 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Anselmo to 6 miles southwest of Merna to 6 miles east of Callaway. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Merna, Anselmo, Berwyn, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Lillian, Round Valley, Walworth and Gates. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 251 and 293. Highway 92 between mile markers 262 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
